name: Barbarian
description: Arriving in Detroit for a job interview, the girl discovers that a guy already lives in the house she booked. After agreeing to stay the night, she soon discovers a secret door in the basement, and behind it there are secrets that are better not to know.

name: The house
description: Arriving in Detroit for a job interview, the girl discovers that a guy already lives in the house she booked. After agreeing to stay the night, she soon discovers a secret door in the basement, and behind it there are secrets that are better not to know.

name: Black hole
description: The distant future. The Palomino spacecraft, flying past a black hole, discovered the missing Cygnus starship in orbit 12 years ago. Despite the threat of being forever captured by the monstrous gravity field of the hole, the crew of the Palomino makes the fateful decision to board the spaceship and solve the mystery of its disappearance.

name: Cyrano
description: Cyrano de Bergerac, a man ahead of his time, is equally skilled in verbal and fencing duels. Convinced that flaws in his appearance make him unworthy of the love of his devoted girlfriend, the brilliant Roxanne, he does not risk revealing his feelings to her, and Roxanne, meanwhile, falls in love with Christian at first sight.

name: Fight club
description: Plagued by chronic insomnia and desperately trying to escape from an excruciatingly boring life, the clerk meets a certain Tyler Darden, a charismatic soap merchant with a perverted philosophy. Tyler is sure that self—improvement is the lot of the weak, and self—destruction is the only thing worth living for.

name: Joker
description: Gotham, early 1980s. Comedian Arthur Fleck lives with his sick mother, who has been teaching him to walk with a smile since childhood. Trying to bring good things into the world and give people joy, Arthur is faced with human cruelty and gradually comes to the conclusion that this world will receive from him not a kind smile, but the grin of the villain Joker.

name: Jurassic park
description: An expansive rich man and professor persuades a couple of paleontologists to come to an island off the coast of Costa Rica, where he has set up a relict park. There are ancient dinosaur animals in this park, which, according to his idea, should become the highlight of the new attraction program.

name: Leon
description: An expansive rich man and professor persuades a couple of paleontologists to come to an island off the coast of Costa Rica, where he has set up a relict park. There are ancient dinosaur animals in this park, which, according to his idea, should become the highlight of the new attraction program.

name: Limitless
description: New York writer Eddie, wanting to overcome a dark streak in his life, takes a classified drug called NZT. The pill puts the guy's brain to work at an unrealistic capacity. This creative drug changes Eddie's whole life, in a short time he earns a lot of money, but soon begins to suffer from the sinister side effects of the drug. And when he tries to find other NZT geniuses to figure out how to deal with this addiction, he learns the terrible truth…

name: Lucy
description: Yesterday she was just a sexy blonde, and today she is the most dangerous and deadly creature on the planet with supernatural abilities and intelligence. What had recently been considered a fantastic theory by the best minds in the world had become a reality for her. And now she will turn from a prey into a huntress.

name: Oppenheimer
description: The life story of American physicist Robert Oppenheimer, who led the first development of nuclear weapons.

name: Star wars
description: The peaceful and prosperous planet of Naboo. The Trade Federation, unwilling to pay taxes, comes into direct conflict with Queen Amidala, who rules the planet, which leads to war.

name: Tron
description: Have you ever thought of getting inside a computer game and becoming a participant in it? Up to a certain point, Kevin Flynn also thought that this was only possible in his imagination. But, once in a secret laboratory developing computer programs, he is given the opportunity to see the electronic world from the inside and fight a fierce battle with the master of the virtual universe himself.

name: Titanic
description: In the first and last voyage of the gorgeous Titanic, two people meet. Jack, a passenger on the lower deck, has won a card ticket, and the rich heiress Rosa is going to America to get married by calculation. The feelings of young people only have time to blossom, and not even class differences will create trials for lovers, but an iceberg that stood in the way of a ship that was considered unsinkable.

name: Us
description: A new horror thriller from the director of the social horror film "Away". Two couples will be at the center of the sinister story: one is white, the second is dark-skinned.
